attributes.title: Maggy

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Maggy is a fortune teller living in [[Lannisport]], the wife of a spice merchant from [[Essos]] who brought her with him from the eastern continent. The nickname "Maggy" is conjectured to be derived from the foreign word "[[Maegi]]".
